title: Paideia: The Ideals of Greek Culture, 3 Vols
description: Each volume was conceived as an independent unit, [Vol 1-Archaic Greece, The Mind of Athens; Vol 2-In Search of the Divine Centre; Vol 3-The Conflict of Cultural Ideas in the Age of Plato], taken together they constitute a monumental integrated survey of the whole Greek cultural tradition in the early & classical periods. A profound & timeless study of the foundation of Western Civilization.
author: Werner Wilhelm Jaeger
